item.title: Cyber Security Analyst role & SOC
item.description: What is a Cyber Security Analyst? A senior position within an organisation security team with direct responsibility for protecting sensitive information and preventing unauthorized access to electronic data and the systems that protect it. Any device that processes or uses the organisations information is covered by the role of a Cyber Security Analyst. Cybersecurity teams contain junior & senior analysts. Analysts are expected to have years of experience working within IT and IT Security.
